verses.plain: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Sion: and unto thee shall the vow be performed.

tokens.t: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Sion: and unto thee shall the vow be performed.

verses.plain: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.

tokens.t: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.

verses.plain: Iniquities prevail against me: as for our transgressions, thou shalt purge them away.

tokens.t: Iniquities prevail against me:
our transgressions, thou shalt purge them away.

verses.plain: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.

tokens.t: Blessed
thou choosest, and causest to approach
he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house,
of thy holy temple.

verses.plain: By terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us, O God of our salvation; who art the confidence of all the ends of the earth, and of them that are afar off upon the sea:

tokens.t: terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us, O God of our salvation;
the confidence of all the ends of the earth, and of them that are afar off
the sea:

verses.plain: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains; being girded with power:

tokens.t: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains;
girded with power:

verses.plain: Which stilleth the noise of the seas, the noise of their waves, and the tumult of the people.

tokens.t: Which stilleth the noise of the seas, the noise of their waves, and the tumult of the people.

verses.plain: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens: thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice.

tokens.t: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens: thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice.

verses.plain: Thou visitest the earth, and waterest it: thou greatly enrichest it with the river of God, which is full of water: thou preparest them corn, when thou hast so provided for it.

tokens.t: Thou visitest the earth, and waterest it: thou greatly enrichest it with the river of God,
is full of water: thou preparest them corn, when thou hast so provided for it.

verses.plain: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly: thou settlest the furrows thereof: thou makest it soft with showers: thou blessest the springing thereof.

tokens.t: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly: thou settlest the furrows thereof: thou makest it soft with showers: thou blessest the springing thereof.

verses.plain: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness; and thy paths drop fatness.

tokens.t: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness; and thy paths drop fatness.

verses.plain: They drop upon the pastures of the wilderness: and the little hills rejoice on every side.

tokens.t: They drop
the pastures of the wilderness: and the little hills rejoice on every side.

verses.plain: The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.

tokens.t: The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.

footnotes.text: Iniquities: Heb. Words, or, Matters of iniquities
and…: or, after thou hadst made it to desire rain
settlest: or, causest rain to descend into
rejoice…: Heb. are girded with joy
